channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: India’s Paytm wins approval to resume onboarding new UPI users
item.description: Paytm, a leading Indian financial services firm, has received regulatory approval to resume onboarding new UPI users, following an eight-month restric...

item.title: Meta Quest 3S Review: The Best Headset for VR Noobs
item.description: Meta’s most affordable VR headset is cheap, light, and easy to use. Just don’t expect to wear it too long, as the battery life isn't great.

item.title: Here’s What the Sustainable Cities of Tomorrow Could Look Like
item.description: Around the world, seeds of regenerative cities have already been planted. As they grow, they will shape the metropolises of tomorrow.

item.title: AT&T and T-Mobile Claim Locked Phones Are Good, Actually
item.description: Mobile carriers argue that locking devices helps them lower costs. Consumer protection groups see it a little differently.

item.title: Feds clear way for EVTOL startups to bring flying vehicles to U.S. airspace
item.description: Federal regulators have cleared the path for electric vertical takeoff and landing aircraft to share U.S. airspace with planes and helicopters — a win...

item.title: Ro CEO Zachariah Reitano says the benefits of being a private company are growing
item.description: Ro co-founder and CEO Zachariah Reitano said while he’d “never say never” about potentially taking the 7-year-old telehealth company public, he thinks...

item.title: 65% OFF Walmart Promo Codes, Coupons | October 2024
item.description: Get up to 65% off flash deals for 1000s of products with hand-picked deals for electronics, groceries, clothing, and more.

item.title: Lending fintech SoLo Funds faces class action lawsuit
item.description: Fintech lending startup SoLo Funds is facing a new class action lawsuit according to a copy seen by TechCrunch. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved...

item.title: Contactless stores to grow in Europe as Sensei reels in another $16M
item.description: While Amazon Go helped pioneer the concept of the totally contactless store, others, like 7-Eleven and Walmart, have entered the territory. And the ar...

item.title: Online Talk About ‘Civil War’ Could Inspire Real-World Violence, DHS Warns Cops
item.description: The agency also cautioned that it’s unable to get a grasp on the full scale of the threat, due to extremists increasingly using encrypted chat tools.
